entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, a boy who is being visited by Dumbledore.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A tall, thin man with silver hair and beard, visiting Harry Potter. He is described as wearing a long black travelling cloak and a pointed hat.

entities.name: vernon dursley
entities.description: Harry's uncle, who is staring at Dumbledore in disbelief. He has a bushy black moustache and is wearing a puce dressing-gown.

relationships.description: Dumbledore has come to visit Harry Potter, as mentioned in the text: 'I daresay Harry has told you I would be coming for him?'
Dumbledore is visiting Vernon Dursley, as mentioned in the text: 'You must be Mr. Dursley. I daresay Harry has told you I would be coming for him?'
